sentences.sContent: Consciousness or cerebration has been said to have emerged in the evolution of higher primates.
sentences.sContent_eng: Consciousness or cerebration has been said to have emerged in the evolution of higher primates.
sentences.sCn: 据说意识或思考在较高级灵长类的进化中已出现。

synos.tran: 思考；精神活动；[心理]脑髓作用

remMethod.val: cerebr (脑) + ation → 用脑， 思考

trans.tranOther: the act of thinking; consideration; thought
